name: Lunara
description:
This game was made in 7 days for Godot Wild Jam #48

It's a tower defense where your play with Arrows to walk, and Z, X, C to construct towers (the staffs) and level up

This game was made by @stephann_v (game design, programming, art, animations) and @ilustratay (art & animations).

Follow Justice Beaver on Twitter.

We didn't have time to balance the difficulty, sorry.

Credits:
Somepx - Fonts (https://somepx.itch.io/)
Kenney - Sound effects (https://kenney.nl/)
DOS-88 - Music (https://dos88.itch.io/)
